sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
form
  h3 {{ quest.id }}
  p {{ quest.text }}
  container.form-check(v-for="(ans, index) in quest.answers")
    input.form-check-input(
      type='radio'
      name='index'
      :value='ans.id'
      v-model="answerID"
      @change="submit()"
      :id='ans.text'
    )
    label.form-check-label(:for='ans.text') {{  ans.text }}
    br
  //- b-form-group(label='Individual radios', v-slot='{ ariaDescribedby }')
  //-   b-form-radio(v-model='selected', :aria-describedby='ariaDescribedby', name='some-radios', value='A') Option A
  //-   b-form-radio(v-model='selected', :aria-describedby='ariaDescribedby', name='some-radios', value='B') Option B
  br
  //- span {{ answer }}
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "HelloWorld",
  data() {
    return {
      selected: false,
      answerID: null,
      answer: null,
      isAnswered: false,
    };
  },
  props: {
    // text: String,
    // answers: [],
    quest: {},
  },
  methods: {
    submit() {
      console.log(this.answer);
      this.answer = this.quest.answers.find(
        (t) => t.id === this.answerID
      ).correct;
      this.$emit("submit", this.answer, this.isAnswered, this.quest.id);
      this.isAnswered = this.answer;
      // if (this.answer) this.isAnswered = true;
      // if (!this.answer) this.isAnswered = false;
    },
  },
};
</script>

<!-- Add "scoped" attribute to limit CSS to this component only -->
<style scoped lang="stylus"></style>
